subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Lakers won the game, but the Suns came away feeling that perhaps they finally have found the missing player in their 40-year scavenger hunt for an N.B.A. championship.
snippet: The Lakers won the game, but the Suns came away feeling that perhaps they finally have found the missing player in their 40-year scavenger hunt for an N.B.A. championship.
